msg.msgText: The client request to publish a message to the server failed because the payload does not conform to the payload format: ConnectionID={0} ClientID={1} Protocol={2} Endpoint={3}.

msgExplanation.p: A message could not be published because the Payload Format Indicator is set to text, and the payload is not valid UTF-8. This log entry is shown only once per connection.

msgUserResponse.p: Do not send a message where the content does not match the declared payload format.
